MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09:50am to safely carry out repairs to an overhead line fault at West Newton substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:18am on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
